name: protoplasmic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
consisting of, or relating to, protoplasm (= the transparent liquid inside all living cells): The amoeba is a colourless, single-celled, jelly-like, protoplasmic organism found in sea and fresh water. Micro-organisms in the soil digest metallic rock minerals into liquid protoplasmic nourishment.
More examplesFewer examplesProtoplasmic astrocytes occur in the grey matter of the central nervous system.The flexible amoeba is the protoplasmic "blob" of popular imagination.A dense protoplasmic mass encases the spermatozoon.
